functions.name: Search_Hotels
functions.description: Search Hotels. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/searchHotels

sort_by.description: `sort_by` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/getSortBy`**(Get Sort By)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.

search_type.description: `search_type` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchDestination`**(Search Hotel Destination)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.

categories_filter.description: `categories_filter` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/getFilter`**(Get Filter)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.

children_age.description:
The number of **children**, including **infants**, who are **under 18**.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
`children_age: 0,1,17`

adults.description: The **number** of guests who are **18 years** of age or **older**. The **default** value is set to **1**.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in. DATE (YYYY-MM-DD)

room_qty.description: The **number** of **rooms** that are required. The **default** value is set to **1**.

dest_id.description: `dest_id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchDestination`**(Search Hotel Destination)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out. DATE (YYYY-MM-DD)

supplier_info.name: Goldcar
supplier_info.dropoff_instructions:
After collecting your luggage, please call our phone number to arrange your shuttle pick-up on on 07 3006 7442 and International Dialling: +61 7 3006 7442. If you are unable to reach us by phone, proceed directly to the shuttle pick-up point. 

For International Bookings: From the arrivals hall, turn left and walk past the Coffee Club. Continue straight ahead towards the exit doors located in the far corner of the terminal. Exit the terminal and head down the ramp to your left, following the pathway to the end of the covered walkway. Cross the pedestrian crossing and wait at shuttle bay 3/4 for the Goldcar shuttle. 

For Domestic Bookings: From the baggage claim area, exit the terminal through the main doors. Walk towards the skywalk and proceed up the travelator. At the top of the travelator, turn left and walk across the skywalk to the second travelator on your right. Exit the terminal, walk across the Skywalk and go down the travelator to B1/B2 on the ground floor. Please wait here for the Goldcar shuttle to collect you.
